name: Lone: Hermit Isles
description:
Lone:

You are a lone hermit living on an island in the middle of the vast ocean

You wake up one morning and find out that you have ran out of food.

So! what does any responsible hermit do when they run out of food?

Collect mushrooms of course!

random mushroom

Controls:

WASD - move 

Left click  - collect mushrooms

Happy playing! ;)

-KittyCat
